title: Razer, WHY are you like this??? - Razer Barracuda Pro
tags: Why does Razer have to do this?
description: Join us in War Thunder for FREE at  and get an exclusive bonus using our link - thanks for supporting the channel!  Razer is a juggernaut in the PC world, but by being so big, have they become their worse own enemy? Adam checks out the latest Barracuda Pro wireless headphones, and it's not great. Let us explain.   Buy a Razer Barracuda Pro:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something specifically for a video?
